version_description: - Bug fixes

– New card expansion Rise of Bahamut added
– New emblems
– Prebuilt decks added
– Replay function to view previous matches
– Get notifications when someone sends you a friend request
– Promotional banners on the Home screen
– See ranks from past seasons
– Play card voices in the inventory
– Simple background now available in Take Two and spectator mode
– Update to pool of cards available when building a deck in Take Two
– Damage estimates during battle disabled
– Data linking feature suspended
- Bug fix
– Stability improvements
– Stability improvements

New content update now live!
- Chapters 9 to 11 added to the main story for Arisa, Erika, and Luna
- Elite 2 difficulty setting added to Practice mode for all leaders
- New option when creating a deck from a deck code to easily create cards you don't have
- In-game notifications are now sent 5, 30, and 60 minutes before the game undergoes maintenance
- Changes to the ability mechanics of some cards
- Changes to the Device Link feature
See the in-game annoucements for more details!

This update includes the following features and changes:
- New card pack Tempest of the Gods added
- Multiple cards can now be liquefied at the same time
- New match options: play best of three and best of five, or select your opponent's deck in private matches
- Decks can now be rearranged on the Decks screen
- You can now spectate Take Two private matches
- Your deck list can now be shared via Twitter
- Cost for the Enhance ability now displayed
- Improvements to the battle log
- Changes to the text of some cards
- The order of cards in your hand will now appear randomized to your opponent
– Stability improvements
– Fixes related to returning to matches

– New card expansion: Wonderland Dreams
– New chapters to the main story
– Solo player missions
– Set leaders for individual decks
– Options added to private match mode: create your opponent’s deck, Best of 3, and Best of 5
– Skip Battle feature added for chapters of the main story already cleared
– Buy Items added to the Shop
– Temporary vial bonus ends for liquefying Prince Catacomb, Lightning Blast, and Wind Reader Zell
– Switch between different text and voice language options

- New chapters to the main story
- New prebuilt decks added
- Changes to download format for the app
- Vials gained for liquefying Shadow Reaper and Test of Strength changed back to their original values
- Phoenix Roost can now be used again
- Changes to card interaction/adjustment to card mechanics
- Adjustments to card costs and abilities
Minor Bug Fixes

- Minor bug fixes
- Adjustments to card costs and abilities

- Starforged Legends card pack added
- Specially illustrated cards with new leaders
- New chapters to the main story
- New feature to assist with clearing main story chapters
- All classes can now be leveled up to 150

- Players who start a private match can now choose whether to play first or second
- Display changes to the Take Two screen when creating a deck
- Vials received for liquefying Alice, Wonderland Explorer, Lion of the Golden City, Vagabond Frog, and Shield of Flame will revert to their original values
- Minor changes to card text
- New chapters to the main story

- Chronogenesis card pack added
- New class "Portalcraft" added
- New format "Rotation" added
- New Chapters to the main story
- Temporary vial bonus ends for liquefying Dimension Shift, Sibyl of the Waterwyrm, Little Soulsquasher, Carabosse, Wicked Fairy, and Staircase to Paradise

- New Dawnbreak, Nightedge card set added
- New leader cards added
- New main story chapters added
- New ability to view effects on leaders during matches
- New ability to view targetable cards when spectating or replaying matches
- Display card information when activated
- Different cards available in Take Two
- Tweaks to card text
- Change to tutorial completion rewards
- Set 3 prebuilt decks added

- New main story chapters
- New Grand Prix feature
- New seer's globe shard item
- Rewordings of some card text
- New option to include animated cards first when using a deck code
- Change to timing at which end-of-turn notification appears during multiplayer battles
- Restoration of the ability to reconnect during private Take Two matches
